name: Wizard Shoes (Conceri Experiments)
description:
MY SHOES!

The powerful wizard Grimblor, master of shoes awakens from a nightmare only to find that, ironically enough, his magic shoes have been stolen!

Help Grimblor retrieve his shoes from the depths of the planet, where the dark emperor Edmund lives. Will you actually manage to succeed in your mission? Will it all come apart at the seams? Find out!

Wizard Shoes is an action game that was made over the span of 2017's December for a Glorious Trainwrecks user named "Speedos."

It's extremely rough around the edges, though that's a combination of deliberate design and constant holiday distractions.

This game was created by Johnny of Conceri Games. It features an edited song from Kirkas and many more assets that have been  credited within the text document the game comes with.
